capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry's affiliation is indeed Hogwarts. I'm quite certain about that, and it's a fact that's widely known. It's not surprising to me that you'd agree with me on this one.
capsules_submitted.reply: interesting! i've never heard of hogwarts before, can you tell me more about this magical school?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Snape's affiliation with Hogwarts is a well-known fact. He was indeed the Potions master during my time there. I remember him being quite intimidating, but also had a certain... complexity to him.

Snape's affiliation with Hogwarts is a bit complicated, to be honest. I mean, he was the Potions master for many years and had a significant impact on the students' education, but at the same time, his behavior towards Harry Potter and other students was often... questionable. He seemed to have a personal vendetta against Harry, which made it difficult for me to see him as just another teacher. I think that's why many people viewed him with suspicion, even though he did play an important role in the wizarding world.
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. what is the name of the character who holds the title at hogwarts?
